DOC.brief_summary: We will study whether taking vitamin D improves asthma control and spirometric values in elderly asthmatics.
DOC.brief_title: Asthma in the Elderly: The Role of Vitamin D
DOC.criteria: Asthma, age of 65 years old or older Current smokers, subjects who smoked more than 10 pack/year, subjects taking digoxin, subjects with liver disease
